scripts.cypress:run:chrome: cypress run --browser chrome --headless --spec ./cypress/integration/**/*.spec.ts --config-file ./cypress/cypress.json --reporter ../../node_modules/cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=./cypress/reporter_config.json; status=$?; ../../node_modules/.bin/mochawesome-merge --reportDir ../../../target/kibana-security-solution/cypress/results-chrome > ../../../target/kibana-security-solution/cypress/results-chrome/output.json; ../../../node_modules/.bin/marge ../../../target/kibana-security-solution/cypress/results-chrome/output.json --reportDir ../../../target/kibana-security-solution/cypress/results-chrome; mkdir -p ../../../target/junit && cp ../../../target/kibana-security-solution/cypress/results-chrome/*.xml ../../../target/junit/ && exit $status;
scripts.cypress:run:firefox: cypress run --browser firefox --headless --spec ./cypress/integration/**/*.spec.ts --config-file ./cypress/cypress.json --reporter ../../node_modules/cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=./cypress/reporter_config.json; status=$?; ../../node_modules/.bin/mochawesome-merge --reportDir ../../../target/kibana-security-solution/cypress/results-firefox > ../../../target/kibana-security-solution/cypress/results-firefox/output.json; ../../../node_modules/.bin/marge ../../../target/kibana-security-solution/cypress/results-firefox/output.json --reportDir ../../../target/kibana-security-solution/cypress/results-firefox; mkdir -p ../../../target/junit && cp ../../../target/kibana-security-solution/cypress/results-firefox/*.xml ../../../target/junit/ && exit $status;
